name: Apple Watch Series 5
description: The most advanced Apple Watch yet, featuring the Always-On Retina display, the ECG app, international emergency calling, fall detection, and a builtâ€‘in compass.

reviews.name: Hugo
reviews.comment: In terms of functionality, behavior and quality, this is what is expected of any Apple product. Only the battery disappoints, with an average duration of 1 day, depending on usage, number of notifications, calls, etc. It does not have native sleep tracking, so it is necessary to install a third party application. GPS sometimes has some "flaws", recording routes a little out of reality. There are other more accurate products, with bigger battery, more features and cheaper, but for those who have iPhone, this is the best choice.

reviews.name: Julie
reviews.comment: I am very satisfied with the product.

reviews.name: Sergey
reviews.comment: Quality, intuition and design ... the brand's three l vectors are very clear. Only autonomy leaves something to be desired! It is almost mandatory to carry the watch every day!
